isis.stitle: TSI 02-12-14 - Performance Specifications for 2002 Model Year HT 530 Engines

subjectgroup.subject: Performance Specifications for 2002 Model Year HT 530 Engines

svcproc.title: Performance Specifications
svcproc.para: The following performance specifications apply to all 2002 model year HT 530 diesel engines equipped with an EVRT™ electronically controlled turbocharger.

entry.para: HT 530/280 hp @ 2000 rpm (950 ft·lbf torque @ 1200 rpm)

para.title: International® HT 530 Diesel Engine Specifications

entry.para: High Idle Speed - rpm with manual transmission
High Idle Speed - rpm with automatic transmission
Injection Control Pressure/Voltage @ Low Idle No Load
Injection Control Pressure/Voltage @ High Idle No Load
Injection Control Pressure/Voltage @ Rated Speed and Full Load

para.title: Intake And Exhaust Valve Clearance (Engine Off - Cold)
Data Taken At: High Idle, No Load, Stabilized Operating Temperature

entry.para: Air Cleaner Restriction (Measured at Engine Side of Air Cleaner)
Air Cleaner Restriction (High Idle, No Load), Max.
Crankcase Pressure Using Restrictor Tool ZTSE4039, Max.

para.title: Data Taken At: Full Load, Rated Speed On Chassis Dynamometer Or Highway, Stabilized Operating Temperature

entry.para: Air Cleaner Restriction (Full Load, Rated Speed), Max.
Intake Manifold Pressure (Full Load, Rated Speed)
Intake Manifold Pressure (Full Load, Peak Torque)

para.title: Measure Water Temperature Differential Across The Radiator With Engine On A Chassis Dynamometer, At Full Load And Ambient Temperature Of 26.7°C (80°F) Or Above
Data Taken After Engine Reaches Stabilized Operating Temperature
Lube Oil Pressure At Operating Temperature (Stabilized)

entry.para: Minimum Cranking rpm Required to Start the Engine
Minimum Battery Voltage Required to Start the Engine
Minimum ICP Pressure / Voltage Required to Start the Engine
